markdownRemark.excerpt: Last year I wrote down my telegram ramblings as a blog post, but it’s too much of a hassle to create a post every time I have some idea for a pet project. This…
markdownRemark.html: Last year I wrote down my telegram ramblings as a blog post, but it’s too much of a hassle to create a post every time I have some idea for a pet project. This year I will write them down in a tweet so that it can be easily catalogued and quickly referenced. Here’s to a better blog layout!

frontmatter.title: Adding twitter feed to my blog
